title: janani jaya parashiva
sahitya:
janani jaya parashiva ramaNi varajanAjana bhajini pAlayamAm jagad-


anupallavi

  dhanapati surapati munisati ratipati dinam nUta navAvaraNa svarUpiNi


caraNam    parvatarAja pUjita sukumAri sarva yantra mantra tantra adhikAri
garmApurajana shamani shrIsadani alkAnala sakhi nayayni carAcara
